channel.title: [RESOLVED] Appealing this random 3 day ban
channel.description:
What happened: Banned 3 days for making a bad joke about how black people always die in horror movies. which is true... stating this is neither racist nor egregious. A warning for a bad joke on someones FIRST offense is quite fair. As an African American man myself I really didn't see the toxicity in the joke to draw a 3 day ban.
What was SUPPOSED to happen: maybe a warning...? I apologize for the bad joke if it offended other lads. As an avid player I humbly ask you remove this ban and ill take it as a warning before further prosecution.
